entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore sacrificed himself to keep you in school, Harry!

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and the son of James Potter

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry's who tries to advise him not to get thrown out of school

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is the person that Harry and his friends are trying to avoid getting caught by

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Harry's who does not give any advice or opinion on what Harry should do

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is the brother of James Potter and a close friend of Harry's

entities.name: james potter
entities.description: James Potter is Harry's father who died when he was young

relationships.description: Dumbledore sacrificed himself to keep Harry in school
